item.title: NWEA Appoints Abby Javurek as Senior Director of Large Scale Assessment Solutions
item.dc:creator: NWEA
item.description:
Previous Director of the Division of Accountability Systems for the South Dakota Department of Education Joins NWEA to Support Vision for Innovative State Assessments

The post NWEA Appoints Abby Javurek as Senior Director of Large Scale Assessment Solutions appeared first on NWEA Stage.
item.content:encoded:
Previous Director of the Division of Accountability Systems for the South Dakota Department of Education Joins NWEA to Support Vision for Innovative State Assessments

The post NWEA Appoints Abby Javurek as Senior Director of Large Scale Assessment Solutions appeared first on NWEA Stage.

item.title: RUSD Adopts MAP Districtwide
item.dc:creator: NWEA
item.description:
Riverside Unified School District adopts MAP growth assessments for use throughout their 14 traditional middle and high schools, serving nearly 13,000 students.

The post RUSD Adopts MAP Districtwide appeared first on NWEA Stage.
item.content:encoded:
Riverside Unified School District adopts MAP growth assessments for use throughout their 14 traditional middle and high schools, serving nearly 13,000 students.

The post RUSD Adopts MAP Districtwide appeared first on NWEA Stage.
